page.title: 17LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {BORDESLEY ABBEY}IS AN IMPORTANT HISTORICAL SITE IN REDDITCH.ARCHAEOLOGISTS ARE CAREFULLY SEARCHING THE SITE FOR INTERESTING ARTEFACTS.IN OUR DISTRICT OF REDDITCH THERE HAS BEEN A LONG HISTORY OF{METAL {WORKING AND FORGING. }THE REMAINS OF HAMMER PONDS CAN BE SEEN,THERE IS AN INTERESTING MUSEUM CALLED "{THE FORGE {MILL}" JUST OUTSIDE THIS DISTRICT.{ {REDDITCH}WAS DESIGNATED A NEW TOWN IN 1964,SINCE THAT DATE THERE HAS BEEN CONSIDERABLE DEVELOPMENT.THE{ {"KINGFISHER CENTRE"}ALLOWS PEOPLE TO SHOP IN THE DRY;THERE HAVE BEEN LARGE HOUSING AND INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENTS.OUR SCHOOL"{HOLYOAKES {FIELD FIRST SCHOOL"}WAS BUILT IN 1913 IT WAS CALLED BRIDGE STREET SCHOOL ORIGINALLY.BOYS AND GIRLS WERE SEPARATED BY A WALL IN THE PLAYGROUND.
